content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.2 out of 5 stars    505 ratings

excerpt.rendered: Palak Note’s Vitamin B12 and Folate work together to help maintain the health of the gastrointestinal tract, nervous system and the metabolism of protein and fats. Both maintain homocysteine levels that are already in the normal range and folate may reduce the risk of neural birth defects, supports healthy heart, helps produce blood cells Supports bone health and prevents osteoporosis, improves mood and reduces symptoms of depression
